content.html: Snapshot tests are very useful when you want to make sure your UI does not change unexpectedly. I've been using it a lot with @pestphp. Never heard about snapshot testing? Check out this article by @sebdedeyne: sebastiandedeyne.com/a-package-for-…. 👍🏻
content.text:
Snapshot tests are very useful when you want to make sure your UI does not change unexpectedly. I've been using it a lot with @pestphp.

Never heard about snapshot testing? Check out this article by @sebdedeyne: sebastiandedeyne.com/a-package-for-…. 👍🏻
